name: Bubble Shoot Deluxe - Ads FREE
description:
Welcome to bubble shooter deluxe! Its Ads FREE version with Maximum Levels!
Bubble Shooter This is very common and addictive bubble shooting arcade and action game for all aged people. Let's play this game to pass your leisure time by making Unlimited FUN! Multiple Levels with nice graphics and animations.

Two modes: Arcade and Puzzle with multiple levels.
